text: BEST Thai in the Madison area, hands down. I've tried almost every Thai place around here and this is the clear winner in my eyes. The ingredients are always fresh and it's always excellent. I really don't understand the negative reviews on here. My husband and I eat here about once a week and it never disappoints. It appears to be family owned and operated. They will actually make the food spicy if you ask for it. Level 3 spicy is perfect for me. Can't recommend them enough!
